content: the ljubljana district court made a decision in a legal case regarding an inheritance the deceased person had a daughter and was a citizen of slovenia the estate includes real estate a bank account pension benefits and a car the court determined that the widow and two daughters are the intestate heirs and each will receive onethird of the assets the heirs have accepted the inheritance but waived their rights to certain assets the court specified who will receive these waived assets the court received the death certificate and proceeded with succession proceedings the estate will be inherited by the children and spouse the parties involved consented to the decision without a probate hearing the court declared the heirs and their shares considering the partial renunciations the court fees will be paid proportionally by the heirs certain steps such as property transfer and obtaining a certificate of final validity still need to be completed instructions for lodging an appeal are provided including the deadline required documents and payment of court fees the appeal will be decided by the ljubljana high court the document concludes with the date of july 29 2021

metadata.subject_of_succession: real estate, bank accounts, unpaid pension benefits, car
